GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.32 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
KVM: SVM: Don't BUG if userspace injects an interrupt with GIF=0

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 6afe88fbb40eac3291a8728688d61fdc745d8008, it was introduced in version v2.6.32 by commit 219b65dcf6c0bad83d51bfa12e25891c02de2414. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: KVM: SVM: Don't BUG if userspace injects an interrupt with GIF=0
